Function.Description: The median function computes the median value (or middle value) from a set of values in the argument list.

Brief.Overview: The median function computes the median value (or middle value) from a set of values in the argument list. The median value is that value which is greater than half of the argument list and less than the other half.
Brief.Usage: The medianfunction is used to produce the median value from a set of values.

Syntax.Return: The median function computes the median value from the arguments and returns it. If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored if they cannot be evaluated as real numbers. If no numeric values are found in the argument list, then an error code is generated.
